spaceWidth.title: Space width
spaceWidth.description: Width of the space character in pixels.

tabWidth.title: Tab width
tabWidth.description: Width of the tab character in pixels.

lineHeight.title: Line height
lineHeight.description: Height of each line in pixels, including any padding. Note that characters whose height is lower than this value will be aligned to the top of the line by default.

baselineOffset.title: Baseline offset
baselineOffset.description: Offset to add to the Y coordinate of each line. Can be negative.

characterSizes.title: Character list
characterSizes.description: List of all glyphs in the texture. Each entry's key must be a single-character string containing a printable Unicode character.

x.title: X offset
x.description: X coordinate of the glyph's top left corner within the texture.

y.title: Y offset
y.description: Y coordinate of the glyph's top left corner within the texture.

width.title: Character width
width.description: Width of the glyph in pixels.

height.title: Character height
height.description: Height of the glyph in pixels.

icon.title: Colored icon flag
icon.description: If true, the glyph will not be colorized when drawing colored text. Useful for glyphs that are not monochrome such as icons.
